roleset.name: plan
roleset.note: AIM-V NOTES: Member of Vncls wish-62. (from aim.01-v)
AIM-N NOTES: Roleset based on aim.01, OntoNotes grouping aim-n sense 1; maps to VN class wish-62. Framed by Claire. (from aim.01-n)

example.name: more bellringing!
example.text: The Central Council of Church Bell Ringers aims *trace* to improve relations with vicars.
example.arg: The Central Council of Church Bell Ringers

example.name: nothing in motion
example.text: The Treasury aims for a $10 billion cash balance at the end of March.
example.arg: for a $10 billion cash balance at the end of March

example.name: Arg 1 and mnr
example.text: It was created with the conscious aim of meeting immediate needs.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: John made no secret of his personal aim to get the high score on Pac Man.
example.arg: to get the high score on Pac Man.

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: The aim of chess is to checkmate the opposing king.

roleset.name: directed motion
roleset.note: AIM-V NOTES: Often metaphorical. No relevant VN class. (from aim.02-v)
AIM-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry aim.02, OntoNotes grouping aim-n sense 3; no relevant mapping to VN. Framed by Claire. (from aim.02-n)

example.name: passivized
example.text: ...the possibility of a consent solicitation aimed *trace* at replacing Georgia Gulf's board.

example.name: all args
example.text: Banks have been aiming packages at the elderly.

example.name: Args 1 & 2
example.text: I saw the gun's aim at my head and ran.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: I laid across the table that I had been hiding under and put my arm right out on the table to support my aim of the gun.
